hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #the Serenade of Water#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground MQ Lava Room Silver Rupee Front Center

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: Have you embraced the power of the Deku Nut yet?

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple First Mirror Right Chest

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that plundering #Kokiri Forest# is a foolish choice.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that ##the Graveyard## has #2# major items.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

HC (Malon).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Water Temple#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Huge Rupee#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Huge Rupee#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: For you, the day you read this hint was the most important day of your life.^But for me, it was Tuesday.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to #the Tower#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that ##the Sacred Forest Meadow## has #2# major items.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Slingshot# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #at the Desert Colossus#, skulltulas at night hold...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Wallet#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #Water Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right hand# is #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #Bombchus (5 pieces)#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #Bombchus (5 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Silver Rupee Center

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that a #like-like in Ganon's Shadow Trial# guards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Shadow Trial Golden Gauntlets Chest

SFM (Saria).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Deku Stick# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that plundering #the Water Temple# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Huge Rupee#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Huge Rupee#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #the Megaton Hammer#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Adult Boulder Silver Rupee Front Right

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the way of the hero.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Prelude of Light#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #the Requiem of Spirit# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #the Deku Tree#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Prelude of Light#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.
